synopsis.text: The anime short film, a vibrant collaboration, is part of the 'TOHO Animation Music Films' project, a grand celebration of TOHO Animation Studio's decade-long journey. Directed by the talented China, this short anime is a visual treat set to the rhythmic beats of CreepHyp's music. The film serves as an official music video for the captivating track 'Rin to,' further enhancing the overall viewing experience. As one of the five unique collaborations, this short film is a testament to the creativity and innovation of various artists and anime creators involved in the project.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
